user_input:
Please create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: DAG-Builder
default_llm_context: Generate hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting applied, then export to TST format. Do not access any PLEXOS database; operate on files/functions only.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Apply node splitting. No PLEXOS DB access.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' across years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting applied.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the appropriate scenario set (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE), years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050), and apply node-splitting when producing the hourly demand profiles. No PLEXOS DB interactions.

tasks.description: Convert/export the generated hourly Hydrogen demand profiles into the TST (study team) standard format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', take the outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' and export them to the TST standard format without using any PLEXOS database.
